content: two complementary shades work together to showcase the beautiful dye effect of caron colorama haze on this quilt-style crochet blanket working single_crochet stitches into the back loops to achieve the textural ridge detail you ll create separate mitered square motifs and then sew them together to construct an ultra-modern blanket for any space this is a perfect project for the on-the-go crafter materials caron® colorama haze™ 8 oz/227 g 649 yds/593 m contrast a aged copper 92008 2 balls or 1186 yds/1080 m contrast b daydream 92001 2 balls or 1186 yds/1080 m measurement approx 55 139 5 cm square
